# createJob(destination:resource:)

**Type Method**

Creates an asset resource upload job.

## Declaration

```swift
class func createJob(destination: URLRequest, resource: PHAssetResource)
```

## Discussion

If the number of jobs exceeds [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceUploadJob/jobLimit] the photo library `performChanges` request will fail with a `PHPhotosErrorLimitExceeded` error. To generate jobs after this limit is triggered, you must acknowledge succeeded/failed jobs, and wait for the registered/pending ones to finish uploading, which will make those jobs also succeeded/failed.

- Parameter:

- destination: the destination [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest] to which this asset resource will be sent.
- resource: the asset resource to be uploaded.
title: createJob(destination:resource:)
